title: Verify data is being sent to Adobe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched the app 

AND

+ Content playback is confirmed on device
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user analyzes the Adobe return in proxy ____
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe important data generated from the Content return in the call

title: Onboarding
custom_preconds: TBD

title: Verify Data Being Sent To Conviva
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched content and received playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user utilizes Conviva Pulse or Touchstone
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user can confirm data is being sent to Conviva from their device's playback

title: Conviva Tags For Non-Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user views their proxy reponse for:

https://mlbtv-test.testonly.conviva.com
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the "Contents" return (Select JSON Text)
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The user can scroll to the contentType return

AND

+ The contentType should return a non-MLBN label: 		

EX: "contentType": "SLIVE"

title: Adobe Tags For Non-Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is observing the proxy response from:

http://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the "Contents" response (Select "Form")
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user can scroll to the contentType return

AND

+ The report should return a Non-MLBN label such as:

contentType = SLive

title: Conviva Tags For Live and Archived Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has launched a live or archived game"

AND

+ The tvOS device session is being proxied
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the data returned from cws.conviva.com in Proxy

AND

+ Searching for "contentType" under Contents
custom_expected:
THEN

+ "contentType": "Live" or "contentType": "Archive" will be returned

title: Adobe Tags For Live and Archived Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a live or archived game

AND 

+ The user is observing the proxy response from:
http://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ Searching for the contentType return in the "Contents" response
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ ContentType = Live or ContentType = Archived will be returned

title: Multiview Tags
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is utilizing the MLB video player multiview feature

AND

+ The user is observing Proxy returns
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user observes the Conviva return in Proxy

AND

+ views the viewType under the contents return
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The viewType should display as "viewType=multiview" for all videos being streamed in the multiview feature

title: All Contents
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an entitled MLB-ALL account
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user navigates to a mixed carousel that has features VOD, SLIVE, SVOD, and FLIVE content
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The user can launch and receive playback for each content type in the mixed carousel

title: Present in Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has logged into an account with an MLBN entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLBN Live Stream can be present in the Hero

title: Playback from Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an account with the MLBN entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the "Watch Live" option on the home page's hero for the MLBN live stream
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback 

AND

+ The MLBN stream will begin playing at the live point

title: Live Indicator Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The MLBN Live stream is available in the hero
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the MLBN hero image
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A "LIVE" indicator will not be present in the hero

title: Duration Not Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The MLBN Live Stream is present in the hero on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the hero
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The duration of the MLBN live stream will NOT be present

title: Present in Today
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has logged into an account with an MLBN entitlement

AND

+ The user's favorited team is playing live
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLBN Live Stream can be present in the "Today on MLB.TV" carousel if the game is in the hero

title: Playback from Today on MLB.TV
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an account with the MLBN entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the MLBN option on the home page's "Today on MLB.TV" carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback 

AND

+ The MLBN stream will begin playing at the live point

title: Live Indicator Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The MLBN Live stream is available in the Today carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the carousel MLBN tile
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A "LIVE" indicator will not be present on the thumbnail

title: Duration Not Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The MLBN Live Stream is present in the Today on MLB.TV carousel on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the MLBN tile in the carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The duration of the MLBN live stream will NOT be present

title: Live Indicator at Live Point
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched an MLBN live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the scrubber
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Video player will begin at the live point

AND

+ A Live indicator will be displayed

title: Closed Captioning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has launched an MLBN live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Selecting the CC quick-action button
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The closed captioning feature will be enabled

AND

+ CC will be present on the video player

AND 

+ The user can toggle the CC feature off

THEN

+ CC will no longer be present on the video player

title: Player Controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched an MLBN live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Utilizing the player controls
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to FF, RW, Play, Pause, and scrub

AND

+ The user can enable Closed Captioning and Picture-in-Picture

AND 

+ Utilize the Jump to Live quick-action if the user scrubbed backwards

title: MLBN without Entitlements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an account without the MLBN or MLBTV/MLBN Adobe Pass entitlement

EX: Unauthorized, Free, Anonymous, and AtBat users.
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the MLBN live stream tile in the "Today on MLB.tv" carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The tile will have a lock icon

AND

+ The user is unable to launch the MLBN content

title: Title and Text Field (VSM Content)
custom_preconds: GIVEN
custom_steps: WHEN
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The fields will display the following copy, 

"MLBN Presents MLB Tonight"
"Join your favorite hosts Harold Reynolds and Fee Chin to recap the best plays of the night!"

title: Background Image (VSM Content)
custom_preconds: GIVEN
custom_steps: WHEN
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The background image will be from VSM content

AND

+ The background image should NOT be the MLB Network logo

AND

+ The backbround image SHOULD be the studio image

title: MLBN Only
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user logs into an account with just MLB Network entitlements

AND

+ The account is not entitled to MLB.tv or other non-game content (SLive, SVOD)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches MLBN content from the Hero or the Today on MLB.TV carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback

AND

+ The MLBN live stream will play at the live point

title: Unentitled User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an account which is not entitled to launch MLBN linear content

OR

+ The user is not signed in (Anonymous Free)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating through the Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will not be shown MLBN content in any carousels or Hero

title: Single Press
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. Users are utilizing the tvOS multi-view feature
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. Users select a secondary player via single press
2. The secondary player has audio focus
custom_expected:
THEN 

1. The secondary player will now become the primary

title: Single Press
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user is viewing games in multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user utilizes the single press action on the primary video feed
custom_expected:
THEN 

1. The primary video will go into full-screen view 

AND 

1. The Multi-view feature will remain in background

title: Full-screen Player Controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing games in multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user has the primary video in full-screen view
custom_expected:
THEN 

1. The user will have access to full video player controls on a single game

title: Double Press
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing games in multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user double presses on the secondary video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The secondary video will gain audio focus

AND

+ The secondary video will move to the primary video player

title: Play/Pause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing games in multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user presses Play or Pause on either the primary video or the secondary video
custom_expected:
THEN

1. That video feed will gain audio focus

AND

1. That video feed will display in full-screen

title: Hidden Controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing games in multi-view

AND

1. A video feed is being viewed in full-screen
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user observes player controls are hidden

AND 

1. The user presses the menu option on controller
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The full-screen view will return to multi-view

title: Multiview Remains Active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing games in multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user launches the primary player into full-screen view
custom_expected:
THEN 

1. Multi-view will remain active in the background

title: Menu/Back Button While Controls are Hidden
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing the multi-view feature

AND

1. The player controls are hidden on the player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user single presses the Menu/Back button on the remote
custom_expected:
THEN

1. All active video players in multi-view will become visible

title: Return to Multiview Quick Action
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing the multi-view feature

AND

2. The user has a video player in full-screen view
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the quick action buttons on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN
 
1. The multi-view quick action button will read "Return to Multi-view"

title: Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing games in multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. A video has audio focus
custom_expected:
THEN

1. An Audio indicator will be displayed on the video feed with audio focus

title: Single Press
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user is viewing games in multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user single-presses the secondary video with no audio focus
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Audio focus will switch to the secondary video

title: One Audio Focused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing games in multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. THE user is switching audio focus from primary to secondary videos or vice-versa
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Only one video has audio focus at a time

title: Collection View Scaled Down
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing app's multi-view feature

AND 

2. The user has brought up the games scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN

3. The user observes the collection view displayed
custom_expected:
THEN

4. The collection view scales down to make room for the games scoreboard

AND

5. The collection view returns to full-scale when the games scoreboard has been dismissed

title: Collection View Positioning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing app's multi-view feature.

AND

1. The user has brought up the games scoreboard.
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user observes the collection view with the games scoreboard displayed.
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The collection view is moved upwards to make room.

title: Animations During Transition
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing app's multi-view feature

AND

1. The user has brought up the games scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user interacts with the games scoreboard on the screen
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe animations when transitioning through various states

title: Games Menu in Video Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live (with more games on that date) or an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the games menu within the video player
custom_expected:
THEN 

1. The user will observe games played on that date that could be launched into multi-view

title: Persistent Messages During Scrolling
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live (with more games on that date) or an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user is navigating through the games menu on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe these messages displayed:

Example: “Single press to view game”

Example: “Press and hold to enter Multi-view”

title: Long Press on Game Tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live (with more games on that date) or an archived game

AND

1. The user is navigating the games menu scoreboard from the video player
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user long presses on a game tile in the scoreboard for two seconds
custom_expected:
THEN

1. That game tile from the scoreboard that is long-pressed will send app into multi-view

title: Adding Games Down Gesture
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live (with more games on that date) or an archived game

AND

1. The user is navigating the games menu scoreboard from the video player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user gestures down on their Apple TV remote from the primary or secondary broadcast
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The games scoreboard will be visible

AND

1. The focus will be on the first non-selected game tile

title: Adding Games Navigating The Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live (with more games on that date) or an archived game

AND

1. The user is navigating the games menu scoreboard from the video player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user single taps on a game tile from the scoreboard view
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The selected game will be added to the multi-view

AND

2. Up to four games can be added at a time to the multi-view

AND

3. If a new game is selected with four video streams already in the multi-view, the last selected video feed will be replaced

title: Removing the Add Overlay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live (with more games on that date) or an archived game

AND

1. The user is navigating the games menu scoreboard from the video player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user is observing the selected game tile in the scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN

1. A "remove" overlay option is displayed for the user

title: Live Game feed auto-select and live point
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live game

AND

1. The user is navigating the games menu scoreboard from the video player
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user selects a game that is live from the video player scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The feed will be auto-selected

AND

1. The feed will begin playback at the live point

title: Archive Game Feed auto-select and Start From Beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live game

AND

1. The user is navigating the games menu scoreboard from the video player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user has selected to launch an archived game from the video player scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Playback of the auto-selected feed will begin at the beginning point of the stream

title: Archive Game Feed auto-select and Resume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live game

AND

1. The user is navigating the games menu scoreboard from the video player
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user selects an archived game from the video player scoreboard

AND 

1. The user had recently watched the feed and bookmarked their position in playback
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Playback will begin at the bookmarked resume point instead of the live or beginning point

title: Hide-Spoilers Logic for Live and Archive Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has Hide Scores enabled

AND

2. The user has launched a live or archived game

AND 

3. The user utilizes the multi-view feature
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user launches another live or archived game in multi-view
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The hide scores logic will be preserved for starting points of selected games

title: EPG Date Follows Selected Game Date Via Config
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user has launched a live or archived game from a specific date (Today, Yesterday, Last Week, Last Month)
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user views the Game Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The Game Scoreboard will include tiles of games that were played or are playing on the same EPG date as the initially launched game.

title: Video Controls are Disabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched a live or archived stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user enters the multi-view feature by selecting another game from the Game Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN

1. All video control functionality will be disabled

AND

1. The user cannot FF/RW/Play/Pause/Quick Actions

title: Closed Captioning Enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an archived or live feed

AND

2. The user has enabled Closed Captions
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user enters the multi-view feature by selecting another game from the Game Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Closed Captioning will continue to be displayed on the active broadcast

title: Chrome Timer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. "Chrome" is defined by an on-screen control that is not related to the video player or scoreboard

AND

1. The user who launched multi-view does not interact with the remote while the chrome is visible
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. There is 5 seconds of idle time
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The Chrome will disappear from the on-screen controls after 5 seconds of no interaction

title: Chrome Not Visible
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. "Chrome" is defined by an on-screen control that is not related to the video player or scoreboard

AND

1. The chrome is not visible due to the user not utilizing the remote and video controls
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user has any interaction with the remote (light trackpad swipe, single-press, double-press, etc.)
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The Chrome will re-appear on the video player

title: Chrome Timer Reset
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. "Chrome" is defined by an on-screen control that is not related to the video player or scoreboard

AND

1. The chrome is visible on the multi-view screen
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user interacts with the remote, as well as changing the multi-view player focus
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The 5-second fadeout timer will reset

AND

1. The 5-second fadeout timer will continue to reset until the user stops all interaction

title: Chrome Multiview Fade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. "Chrome" is defined by an on-screen control that is not related to the video player or scoreboard

AND

1. The chrome is visible while the user is focused on the multi-view scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps the Menu/Back button on the remote while focused in the multi-view scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The scoreboard should collapse and fade multi-view chrome

title: Non-Audio-Emitting Context Legend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user has entered multiview

AND

1. The user has focused on the secondary non-audio emitting video player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the upper-right corner of the video player multiview screen
custom_expected:
THEN

1. A dynamic context legend will display, stating that the user can

switch audio (single-press)

swap players (double-press),

go fullscreen (play/ pause)

exit multiview (back)

title: Audio-Emitting Context Legend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has entered multi-view

AND

1. The user has focused on the secondary audio emitting video player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the upper-right corner of the video player multi-view screen
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The following legend items will be displayed:

swap players (single-press),
go fullscreen (play/ pause)
exit multiview (back)

title: Non-Audio-Emitting Context Legend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has entered multi-view

AND

1. The user has focused on the primary non-audio emitting video player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the Dynamic Context Legend in the top-right of the multiview screen
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The following items will be displayed in the context legend


Switch audio (single-press)
Go fullscreen (play/ pause)
Exit multiview (back)

title: Audio-Emitting Context Legend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has entered multiview

AND

1. The user is focused on the primary audio-emitting player
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the Dynamic Context Legend in the top-right of the multiview screen
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will see the following context items displayed

Go fullscreen (single-press or play/ pause)
Exit multiview (back)

title: Rearrangement of Game Tiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

* The user has launched multi-view

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN

* The user is focused on a video player's "Remove" overlay and selects the option

AND

* The video player tile is removed from multi-view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN

* The "Remove" overlay is no longer displayed on that game tile

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN

* A game has been removed from multiview from the multi-view games scoreboard

AND

* The user leaves the multi-view games scoreboard

AND

* The user returns to the multi-view games scoreboardd
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN

* The multi-view games scoreboard rearranges its order

title: Rearrangement of Game Tiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched multi-view

AND

1. Video playback has ended for a stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The player for that completed stream is removed from the multi-view screen automatically
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The layout configuration will update prior to focus changes

title: Exit Multiview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user utilizing multiview only has one video player remaining

AND

1. The "Remove" overlay on the scoreboard now displays "Exit Multiview"
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Exit Multiview"
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The remaining video player will exit multiview

AND

1. The video player will completely return to full-screen with full controls.

title: Selecting Menu/Back on Remote
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing multiview without a visible scoreboard.
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user presses the Menu/Back option on the remote
custom_expected:
THEN 

1. An exit modal with options "Okay" and "Cancel" are available

title: Returning To Full-Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing multiview without the scoreboard visible

AND

1. The user selects the Menu/Back button on their remote
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Okay" on the exit modal
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will exit the multiview experience and return to a full-screen view.

AND 

1. The audio-focused video player will return to full-screen with all controls.

title: Selecting Cancel on Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing multiview without the scoreboard visible

AND

1. The user selects the Menu/Back button on their remote
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Cancel" on the modal
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The modal is dismissed from view

AND

2. The video player in focus will not change

title: Removing Failed Video Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is utilizing the multi-view feature
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. A video player on the multi-view screen experiences a playback failure
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The standard failed playback modal will display

AND

1. Only the video player that experienced the failed playback state will be removed

AND

1. All remaining players will remain intact

title: Launching Multiview With Active PiP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing a game in PiP mode while navigating the app
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user launches another game from the scoreboard to launch the multi-view feature
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The player with video and audio playback in PiP will close automatically upon entering multi-view

title: Launching PiP With Active Multiview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user backgrounds their active multi-view session
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user launches PiP on a video player with their multi-view session backgrounded
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The existing multi-view session will end completely

title: Location Check Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has freshly installed the MLB app from the app store
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches the app for the first time

AND

+ The user views the MLB location check prompt
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be able to select Don't Allow, Allow Once, and Allow While Using App

title: Welcome Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user has freshly installed the MLB app from the app store
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects an option on the location check prompt

AND

1. The user is sent to the Welcome to the MLB app page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user can choose the following options: Get Started, Have an MLB account? and Restore Purchase

title: Get Started
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has freshly installed the MLB app from the app store
custom_steps:
WHEN

 1.The user selects the Get Started option from the Welcome page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be sent to the Favorite Team page

AND

1. After will be sent to the Create Account page where the user can create a free account, browse subscriptions, explore free content, and Log In

title: Have An MLB Account?
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has freshly installed and launched the MLB app
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects the "Have an MLB Account?" option on the Welcome page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be able to Sign in with their apple device, sign in manually using their remote, or restore their purchase

title: Restore Purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has freshly installed and launched the MLB app
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects Restore Purchase on the Welcome page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will receive a message stating if their subscription has been restored or not

AND

1. If restored, the user will be navigated to the create a free MLB account page where they can skip the linking process

title: Game Tiles Branding
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is being broadcasted on Apple+ Streaming
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a game tile for a game being shown on Apple+ Streaming
custom_expected:
THEN the Apple+ pill will be displayed on the game tile
AND the copy "Watch Live on Apple+" will be shown

title: Hero Branding
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is being broadcasted on Apple+ Streaming
custom_steps: WHEN a game being shown on Apple+ streaming is displayed as a featured game in the HERO
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an Apple+ pill in the hero

title: Feed Select
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is being broadcasted on Apple+ Streaming
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game from the game tile or HERO to bring up the feed select menu
custom_expected:
THEN the video feeds options will be replaced with specific messaging
AND any blackout games will be displayed with specific Apple+ blackout messaging

title: Archived Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is being broadcasted on Apple+ Streaming
custom_steps: WHEN a broadcast that is an Apple+ game goes final and archived
custom_expected:
THEN the apple+ messaging will be removed
AND it will display video feed and play like a normal archived game

title: Feed Copy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is being broadcasted on Apple+ Streaming
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the feed select menu
custom_expected: THEN the following message will be displayed, "This broadcast is available to watch exclusively on Apple TV+. Please download from your device app store to watch now or visit [link tbd] to learn more. Archives will be available 90 minutes after the end of the game. Live Audio is available on MLB.TV"

title: Playback Error Copy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is being broadcasted on Apple+ Streaming
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to receive playback but there is an error
custom_expected: THEN the following copy will be displayed, "This broadcast is available to watch exclusively on Apple TV+. Please download from your device app store to watch now or visit [link tbd] to learn more. Archives will be available 90 minutes after the end of the game. Live Audio is available on MLB.TV"

title: Browse Subscriptions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

* The user navigates to the Browse Subscriptions page from "Get MLB.tv" in settings
custom_steps:
WHEN

* The user observes the paywall page
custom_expected:
THEN

* An MLB Logo and MLB copy will be displayed on the top-left of the page

* "Choose your plan" header with body copy is displayed

* Yearly and Monthly segments available

* MLB.TV All Teams available for Yearly and Monthly subscriptions

* MLB At Bat audio-only is available for Yearly and Monthly subscriptions (tvOS is currently not supporting an independent Audio EPG)

title: MLB.TV All Teams Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing the MLB paywall
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Yearly IAP segment
custom_expected:
THEN

1. MLB.TV All Teams copy will display
2. The (price) /yearly is displayed underneath
3. Updated copy is displayed underneath

AND

1. "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/appletv to learn more." is displayed at the bottom of the screen.

title: MLB At Bat Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the MLB paywall
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Yearly IAP page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. At Bat copy will display
2. The (price) /yearly is displayed underneath
3. Updated copy is displayed underneath

AND

1. "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/appletv to learn more." is displayed at the bottom of the screen.

title: MLB.TV All Teams Monthly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user has navigated to the MLB.tv Paywall

AND

1. The user switches their focused segment from Yearly to Monthly
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Monthly segment of the IAP page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. All Teams Monthly copy will display
2. The (price)/monthly is displayed underneath
3. Updated copy is displayed underneath

AND

1. "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/appletv to learn more." is displayed at the bottom of the screen.

title: MLB At Bat Monthly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the MLB.tv Paywall page

AND

1. The user switches their focused segment from Yearly to Monthly
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Monthly IAP segment
custom_expected:
THEN

1. At Bat copy will display
2. The (price)/monthly is displayed underneath
3. Updated copy is displayed underneath

AND

1. "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/appletv to learn more." is displayed at the bottom of the screen.

title: Start of IAP Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

* The user has completed onboarding 

AND

* Has selected to explore the app as a free user
custom_steps:
WHEN

* The user selects the Get MLB.TV option on the top nav options 

OR 

* The user selects the Get MLB.tv option from the settings menu
custom_expected:
THEN

* The user is able Browse Subscriptions

AND

* The user may begin the IAP flow

title: Complete IAP Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

* The user selects a Yearly or Monthly plan option from the Browse Subscriptions page (Choose Your Plan)
custom_steps:
WHEN

* The user signs into their Apple ID 

AND

* Verifies their purchase on the Apple TV app
custom_expected:
THEN

* The user will be shown a successful purchase message

AND

* The user can choose their favorite team

AND

* The user is asked to link their anonymous IAP with an MLB account

OR

* The user can skip linking their account and explore the app

title: Successful Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

* The user has completed a successful IAP flow

AND

* The user attempts to play a live or archived game within their entitlements (MLB.tv / All Teams)
custom_steps:
WHEN

* The desired game stream launches
custom_expected:
THEN

* Playback will begin without any issues (MVPD or Blackouts may affect test)

title: Link Account & Verify on 2nd Device
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. A user has completed an IAP flow on their Apple TV device

AND

1. The user connects their purchase to an MLB account
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user signs into the newly created MLB account on another device
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe entitlements held from that account on the Settings page

AND

1. The user is able to receive playback of subscriber content

title: Restore Purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user has re-installed the MLB app on their device
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Navigating to the Settings section 

AND

1. Selecting "Restore Purchase" from the options
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will receive a "Success" message stating that their exisiting subscription has been restored

AND

1. The user receives proper playback of subscriber content as expected

title: MVPD Pill on Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is not entitled/authorized to view MVPD-required streams due to being a free user or logged into an account without a cable provider linked
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the Home tab

AND

1. The user views the MVPD-required playoff game in the hero
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will see an MVPD-Required pill located on the hero to relay to the user that they will need extra authorization to view playback

title: MVPD Pill on Game Tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user is not entitled/authorized to view MVPD-required streams due to being a free user or logged into an account without a cable provider linked
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the Games tab

AND

1. The user views the game tile for the MVPD-required matchup
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will see an MVPD-Requirement pill displayed on the game tile

title: English Copy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is authorized to view MVPD-required streams due to being a free user or logged into an account without a cable provider linked
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the Home page

AND

1. The user views the hero image for an mvpd-required stream
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will see the following message displayed, "Authentication to a participating pay TV provider is required to view select Postseason games in the U.S.. To authenticate, visit mlb.tv/postseason."

title: Spanish Copy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user's device or app preferred language settings are set to Spanish

AND 

1. The user is authorized to view MVPD-required streams due to being a free user or logged into an account without a cable provider linked
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the Home page

AND

1. The user views the hero image for an mvpd-required stream
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will see the following text displayed, “Autenticación de un proveedor de televisión por pago se requiere para ver juegos selectos de Postemporada en EE.UU. Para autenticar, visita mlb.tv/postseason.”

title: English Copy Without Authorization (Canada)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is located in an area that is not authorized to view MVPD-required postseason games (Canada)

AND 

1. The user navigates to the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user views the hero image for a postseason game
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will see the following message displayed, "Live game video of this Postseason game is not available in Canada. Live audio is available for every Postseason game.”

title: Spanish Copy Without Authorization (Canada)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has changed their preferred device/app language to Spanish in device settings

AND

1. The user is located in an area that is not authorized to view MVPD-required postseason games (Canada)

AND

1. The user navigates to the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user views the hero image for a postseason game
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The following message with be displayed, "El video del juego en vivo de este juego de postemporada no está disponible en Canadá. El audio en vivo está disponible para cada juego de postemporada.”

title: Successful Login
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has entered credentials with MVPD authorization and entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the Home page and views the hero and game tiles featured
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will not see lock icons on content that they are entitled to

title: Successful Stream Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has entered credentials with MVPD authorization and entitlements (Linked account to cable provider on phone or web)
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the Home page and views the hero and game tiles featured

AND

1. The user selects a game to launch
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The stream begins playback immediately without an MVPD flow on the tvOS device.

title: Pre-game State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a game tile that has broadcast options available on the Home and Games pages
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ There is a pregame show available on one of both broadcasts
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe:

- [TEAM] Pregame Show/s copy while the pregame show is in-progress
- A "LIVE" tag once game is in warm-up state (pregame show may still be airing)
- First batter with name, picture, and stats at the start of the game
- Team Logos, Team abbreviations, and records
- A Score of 0-0 
- Gray/Unfilled bases 
- Gray/Unfilled outs counter
- Apple TV+ pill if necessary
- MLB.tv Free Game of the Day pill if necessary

title: Settings - Logged In User
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user navigates to the settings page
custom_steps: WHEN the user Logs into their account
custom_expected:
THEN "Close MLB Account" will be displayed at the bottom of the settings page. 
AND the option will not be visible if the user is signed out

title: Settings - Close MLB Account Option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user navigates to the settings page
AND the user is signed into their account
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the settings options
custom_expected: THEN "Close MLB Account" will be displayed at the bottom of the page

title: Settings - Selecting Close MLB Account Email Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user navigates to the settings page
AND the user is signed into their account
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Close MLB Account" on the settings page
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive a message kickstarting the account removal process

title: Email Confirmation Message EN/ES
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user navigates to the settings page
AND the user is signed into their account
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Close MLB account" at the bottom of the settings page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive this message in EN: “The procescs to close your MLB Account has been initiated. Please check your email for more information.” 

AND this message in ES: “Se ha iniciado el proceso para cerrar su Cuenta MLB. Por favor revise su correo electrónico para más información”

title: User Keeps Full Access
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps on the "Close MLB Account" option at the bottom of the settings page
custom_steps: WHEN the user decides to not follow through with the account removal process
custom_expected: THEN the user will still have full access to the MLB tvOS app and it's features

title: Sign In Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged out of the MLB app

AND

1. The user has navigated to the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Log In"
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user can sign into their account with their apple device, manually on the tvOS app, and restore purchase.

title: Leagues and Teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Settings page of the app
custom_steps:
WHEN 

1. The user selects the Favorite Team option in the list
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be navigated to the Favorite Team selection page

AND

1. The labels for the American League with divisions and teams will be displayed on the left

AND

1. The labels for the National League with divisions and teams will be displayed on the right

AND

The correct logos will be displayed for all 30 teams

title: Hide Spoilers Enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing the Settings page from the top navigation menu
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. "Off" is displayed next to Hide Spoilers 

AND

1. The user selects the Hide Spoilers option from the list
custom_expected:
THEN

2. Once selected, the Hide Spoilers option will now display "On" and be enabled

title: Hide Spoilers Off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing the Settings page from the top navigation menu
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The Hide Spoilers option displays "On"

AND

1. The user selects the Hide Spoilers option
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The Hide Spoilers option will now display "Off"

title: Hide Spoilers Enabled and Home Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing the Settings page from the top navigation menu

AND

1. The user enables Hide Spoilers, displaying "On"
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the Home page from the top navigation menu
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Specific carousels such as "Most Popular", "In-Season MLB Highlights", and more will be hidden from view to avoid spoilers

AND

1. Scores and game states in the games carousel and Hero will be hidden as well

title: Hide Spoilers Enabled and Games Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing the Settings page from the top navigation menu

AND

1. The user enables Hide Spoilers, displaying "On"
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates to the Games page from the top navigation menu
custom_expected:
THEN

1.  Game tiles will hide all game state information entirely by displaying "Hide Spoilers On" in the tile 

AND

1. "Live" and "Final" copy will still remain visible for users

title: Page Copy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user navigates to the Settings page

AND

1. The user selects the Get MLB.TV option
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The Get MLB.TV page is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The MLB Logo will be displayed in the top-left

AND

1. "Create an MLB Account" copy will be displayed above "Watch the MLB.TV Free Game of the Day." copy

AND

1. "Browse Subscriptions" and "Explore Free Content" buttons will be available to select

AND

1. "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/appletv to learn more." copy will be displayed in the bottom-center of the page

title: Browse Subscriptions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user navigates to the Settings page

AND

1. The user selects the Get MLB.TV option
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects the Browse Subscriptions button
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be able to review the various streaming subscriptions offered

title: Explore Free Content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user navigates to the Settings page

AND

1. The user selects the Get MLB.TV option
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects the Explore Free Content option
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be sent back to the Get MLB.TV option on the settings page

AND

1. The user can navigate the app or re-launch the Get MLB.TV page

title: Favorited Team Background
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has favorited a team

AND

1. The user selects Get MLB.TV in the settings menu
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Utilizing the MLB.TV page with a favorited team
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The background image will be team-specific

AND

1. The background will match the image from Settings

title: Messaging - Success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user navigates to the Settings page

AND

1. The user has an active MLB.tv subscription linked to their Apple ID or linked MLB account
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Restore Purchase"
custom_expected:
THEN

1. A message stating a Successful purchase will be displayed

AND

1. The copy will read, "Success" and "Existing subscription has been restored."

title: Messaging - Unsuccessful
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user navigates to the Settings page

AND

1. The user does not have an active subscription linked to their Apple ID
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user selects "Restore Purchase"
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will receive a message stating "Restore Failed" and "Unable to restore existing subscription."

AND

1. Selecting "Okay" will navigate the user back to the settings page

title: Copy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Settings section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates down to the Terms of Service option
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe the following copy:

"For Terms of Service, please visit mlb.com/tou

For Privacy Policy, please visit mlb.com/privacy

Please visit mlb.com/do-not-sell-or-share-my-personal-data to opt out of targeted advertising and tracking."

title: Copy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Settings section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user navigates down to the Contact Support option
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user should observe the following copy:

"Have questions? For in-game support, please visit us on the web at mlb.tv/support."
